checks.name: Conversion actions defined
checks.finding: 13 conversion actions (2x PURCHASE, 2x PHONE_CALL_LEAD, 1x GET_DIRECTIONS, 2x CONTACT, 1x ENGAGEMENT, 1x BEGIN_CHECKOUT, 1x DEFAULT, 1x CONVERTED_LEAD, 1x PAGE_VIEW, 1x SIGNUP). Recording 0 conversions in 30d.

checks.name: Enhanced conversions
checks.finding: Enhanced conversions or offline import detected — recovers 5-15% of conversions lost to cookie restrictions.

checks.finding: Server-side or offline conversion import active — bypasses ad blockers and browser restrictions.

checks.name: Conversion categories
checks.finding: 10 conversion categories: 2x PURCHASE, 2x PHONE_CALL_LEAD, 1x GET_DIRECTIONS, 2x CONTACT, 1x ENGAGEMENT, 1x BEGIN_CHECKOUT, 1x DEFAULT, 1x CONVERTED_LEAD, 1x PAGE_VIEW, 1x SIGNUP.

checks.name: Micro vs macro separation
checks.finding: 0 primary actions, all macro conversions. Smart Bidding is optimizing for real business outcomes.

checks.name: No duplicate counting
checks.finding: Potential duplicates: 3x "purchase" actions; 3x "call" actions. Duplicates inflate counts 2-3x and cause Smart Bidding to overbid.

checks.name: GA4 linked
checks.finding: GA4 conversion actions linked — enables cross-device tracking and richer audience data.

checks.name: Tags firing
checks.finding: 13 actions recording 0 conversions in 30d. Data is flowing.

checks.name: Search term waste
checks.finding: $29 spent on 5 zero-conversion search terms (100% of $29 visible search spend). Top waste: "imax tusayan" $9, "grand canyon imax theater" $8, "imax grand canyon" $6, "grand canyon imax" $4, "imax theater grand canyon" $1.

checks.name: Negative keyword lists
checks.finding: 1 list(s) with 1 total negatives. Add themed lists (Competitors, Job Seekers, Irrelevant) — minimum 3 for proper filtering.

checks.name: Account-level negatives
checks.finding: 1 negative keywords across 1 lists. Low count — most accounts need 50-200+ negatives for proper coverage.

checks.name: Match type performance
checks.finding: No broad match keywords active. PHRASE: $31, 0 conv. BROAD: $0, 0 conv.

checks.name: Zero-conversion keywords
checks.finding: 2 keywords spent $27 with 0 conversions in 30d. Top waste: "grand canyon imax" $18, "imax tusayan" $9.

checks.finding: 1 naming prefix(es) across 1 campaigns. Consistent naming convention.

checks.finding: 1 ad groups across 1 campaigns (avg 1/campaign).

checks.finding: 1 ad groups per campaign on average. Manageable structure.

checks.finding: No active PMax. Consider launching with strong asset groups and audience signals.

checks.finding: No concurrent Search + PMax.

checks.name: Budget allocation
checks.finding: 1 campaigns, $30/day budget, 100% Search Impression Share. Worst: CTM - Grand Canyon (Branded) (0x ROAS, $31). $31/month on below-1x-ROAS or zero-conversion campaigns.

checks.name: Budget utilization
checks.finding: $30/day budget, ~$1/day actual spend (3% utilization). Under-delivery — check targeting, bids, or Quality Score.

checks.name: Geographic targeting
checks.finding: Correctly using "Presence" targeting.

checks.name: Network settings
checks.finding: Search campaigns properly isolated from Display Network.

checks.name: Quality Score
checks.finding: Avg QS: 6.9/10 across 39 scored keywords (31 at 7+, 3 below 5).

checks.name: Zero-impression keywords
checks.finding: 6341 of 6883 enabled keywords had 0 impressions in 30d. These are too restrictive, low-volume, or outranked — review and pause dead keywords.

checks.name: Keyword-to-ad relevance
checks.finding: Avg QS 6.9 indicates good keyword-to-ad relevance.

checks.name: RSA Ad Strength
checks.finding: 1 RSAs: 1 Good/Excellent, 0 need improvement (1 GOOD).

checks.name: PMax performance
checks.finding: No active PMax campaigns.

checks.name: CTR vs benchmark
checks.finding: Account CTR: 23.53%. Strong CTR.

checks.name: Smart bidding
checks.finding: Manual CPC with 0 conversions/month. Below 15-conv threshold for Smart Bidding — use Maximize Clicks to build volume first.

checks.finding: 100% Search Impression Share — strong coverage.

checks.finding: 0 conversions/month with Manual CPC. Below threshold — focus on building conversion volume.
